import React from 'react' import ReactHtmlParser from 'react-html-parser'; import ProdLink from "pages/Prods/Prod/parts/Link" import { ProdImage } from 'pages/Prods/Prod/parts/Image' import { f_cur } from "helpers/formatter" const Row = (props) => { const { prod, className } = props let className_f = className ? className : '' let currency = f_cur(prod.currency); let prices =
{prod.price} {currency} {prod.oldprice} {currency}
return (
{prod.name} {prod.name}
{prices}

{ReactHtmlParser(prod.claim)}

{ReactHtmlParser(prod.description)}
{prices}

{ReactHtmlParser(prod.claim)}

) } export default Row
